thread.title: Israel's migrant deportation plays on Jewish 'moral compass'

title: Israel's migrant deportation plays on Jewish 'moral compass'
text:
Israel's migrant deportation plays on Jewish 'moral compass' 5:52pm IST - 02:20 
Israel has started handing out notices to 20,000 male African migrants giving them two months to leave the country or risk being thrown in jail. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Israel has started handing out notices to 20,000 male African migrants giving them two months to leave the country or risk being thrown in jail. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BJ3LoP
